channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DeepSeek’s success shows why motivation is key to AI innovation
item.description: How did DeepSeek attain such cost-savings while American companies could not? Let's dive into the technical details.

item.title: The future of safety in robotics with Ouster Lidar
item.description: This week, Angus Pacala, co-founder and CEO of Ouster Lidar, discusses its latest safety features and 3D zone monitoring. The post The future of safet...

item.title: ‘I’m literally afraid to look at my balance’: I have $300K in a 2025 target-date fund. Is there a chance it will recover?
item.description: “I have no idea at this point how much I have lost.”

item.title: ‘I’m very cynical’: My stepmother, 85, makes bizarre requests for money from my father’s $10M trust. Should I be concerned?
item.description: “He used a crappy lawyer to set up a very boilerplate trust agreement.”

item.title: ‘I survived a head-on car wreck’: I’m on Medicaid, but inheriting $290K. How do I protect it from the 5-year look-back rule?
item.description: “About 30 years ago, I survived a head-on car wreck. I was put on 100% disability. I have not worked since.”

item.title: Learn how warehouse automation is leading to ‘lights out’ fulfillment
item.description: Experts from RightHand Robotics, Accutech, and SIMPL Automation will explain the potential of lights out warehouses. The post Learn how warehouse auto...

item.title: Here’s how much money Shedeur Sanders lost out on by falling to the fifth round of the NFL draft
item.description: Sanders was once projected to go as high as No. 1 overall, with No. 3 overall to the New York Giants seemingly as low as he could go.

item.title: ‘An argument ensued’: My mother entrusted my inheritance to her second husband. That’s when it all went horribly wrong.
item.description: “He is a managing director at a major bank and probably clears $800,000 per annum.”

item.title: Pony.ai unveils 7th gen self-driving platform, plans for mass production this year
